title: I cant make ezreal work =[
body:
No matter what rune i use i just cant do anything as ez.

Conquerer is ok but gl scaling when you need a tear and you got no pots or any early cdr.
Just get poked out of lane and zoned off cs or dived by jungler.

Tried electrocute with ap build but your burst is so low due to all the nerfs youll be lucky to half hp someone unless you are extremely ahead.

Has anyone been able to make ezreal work since the removal of klepto and him still suffering every nerf he got thanks to it.

replies.body:
Welcome to the best reason not to have stuff like Klepto in the game. 

Ez became trash tier overnight, because he was balanced against a keystone he could abuse.
I argued from its inception that Klepto was a horrible idea, but everyone said Ezreal was the problem, and not the rune. . .

well this goes back to my argument against runes reforged and how unbalanced the new keystone/rune system is. 

i for one never wanted the runes reforged i thought it was a mistake and its a big reason for imbalance in the game.

Also i just wanna see some of his nerfs removed.
Q ap ratio an base damage rebuffed to pre nerfed values.
E cooldown nerf reverted
R Reduced minion damage removed and cooldown slightly reduced maybe instead of 120 sec it can be 100 seconds.
W cooldown reduced to 7 seconds instead of 9, it used to be 7 seconds pre rework new one is terrible to play around.

Just put power back into his kit as a champion, he shouldnt be a walking caster minion with a low cd flash that does him no good if he the enemy can just chase him down because he does no damage an is not a threat at all to them. id say caitlyn net is better than ezreal E atleast it slows people chasing her an allows her to proc headshot to nuke them with big damage. ezreal will just E away from you an you will just run him down while side steping Q and the time he takes to cast spells like Q or E or W you can just run him down even faster.

why not presence of mind and manaflow band ? 

you can increase over all mana by 500 with presence with take downs and it restores mana 

then with mana flow band you increase mana by 250 and restore 1% of missing mana every 5 secs

those two runes will give you 750 mana the same as a tear

problem is bf sword on ezreal builds into nothing of value later on other than ga, but ezreal kit doesnt go ga untill th very last item. your better off with a sheen + tear if you can back on 1900g. he is in a very poor spot on his laning now as with klepto you could back early get a tear or a sheen and also got wards/pots to keep yourself safe. the counterplay to that was just avoid his skillshots and punish him if he AA you after using Q. now you can eat his skillshots he wastes mana and gets nothing out of it since you can just lifesteal it back up or even all in him or poke him back an he doesnt have life steal so you win the trade an the lane.

yes i get the 5 secs after take down on presence of mind , but its 100 perma mana up to 500 for take downs. and its not unique targets.

Just wait for next patch hopefully Riot will revert some more nerfs

While I cant count how many others are unplayable bot right now and haven't been viable in a long time

Well, Ezreal used to have a free lane where you'd get free gold while being ultra safe and quickly getting to items. You're back to the same level of other ADC. You now have to farm and play early properly instead of depending on a gimmicky free-gold rune.

Sorry, I'm partly serious part teasing you. Dark Harvest scales really well on him. Your poke late game becomes really powerful and your ultimate is great in a variety of situations. That's the one I'd go towards probably.

Again this is not about what runes are good on ezreal, the issue is his kit has been nerfed into trash tier due to klepto helping him though the laning, so now he has no way to get though the lane an get items since he has no wave clear and can be harassed out of lane + force E on ganks or engages costs a ton of mana early and he will never get to be a champion due to just being to weak. similar to old rework kayle who didnt get ranged untill lvl 11.

That character was garbage before with his lack of waveclear, mediocre damage (until later in the game, which is only..), single-target, zero utility, all-skill-shot and slow attack speed kit. At least he made some EZ money with klepto before to offset his required {{item:3070}} purchase. Please for the love of all that is good, don't play that character until they hyper buff him in some way or make a DECENT keystone to replace klepto, not that RNG garbage that somehow got past the preseason planning board :D

It's sad to see that once again, when an item or Rune irisproblematic, Ezreal got to be nerfed into the ground to be balanced and be forced to use said item/rune.

it ALWAYS happens. Now that the problematic item/rune is gone, we can see how bad he got nerfed since 2 years...

He will get buffed multiple times, Riot will release something new again without testing it on Ez and it will happen again.

They should just rework his Q already. Stop the On-Hit effects proc from Q and just add a dmg scaling with lvl instead to compensate. That will already help for the future.
